rules_text:
If you would create a token, you may instead create a token that's a copy of this creature.
Flow – {X}: This creature becomes a copy of target creature with mana value X, except it isn't legendary. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for {1}.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“One day, you'll be just like me! Actually, you should ignore that last part...”[/i]
